viewData.name: Samsung Q900 82" Class HDR 8K UHD QLED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung Q900 82" Class HDR 8K UHD QLED TV featuring 8K UHD 7680 x 4320 QLED Panel, HDR10, HDR10+, HLG Support Motion Rate 240 for Reduced Motion Blur. Review Samsung Q900
viewData.long_description: View content at eight times the resolution of 1080p with the Samsung Q900 82" Class HDR 8K UHD QLED TV. This TV has an 81.5" Quantum Dot LED-backlit LCD panel, and incorporates Motion Rate 240 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. It is compatible with the HDR10, HDR10+, and HLG HDR formats to provide a wider color gamut with compatible content and other equipment for more vivid images. The Q900 has built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Three USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
